languages.text: Нам нельзя высаживаться. Я знаю, что я видел — и нет, нам нельзя туда высаживаться. Дело не в том, что ветер способен содрать обшивку с десантного шлюпа за мгновение. И не в том, что температура на поверхности скачет от раскаленной плазмы к абсолютному нулю. Важно другое — у планет не бывает лиц. А у этой оно было. Огромное лицо из скальных плато, глаза из пыльных смерчей, пасть — расщелина на половину континента. И я видел, как это лицо улыбнулось мне. Оно видело меня и всех нас. Нам нельзя высаживаться. Помилуй нас Император!

traits.locale_text: Нам нельзя высаживаться. Я знаю, что я видел — и нет, нам нельзя туда высаживаться. Дело не в том, что ветер на способен содрать обшивку с десантного шлюпа за мгновение. И не в том, что температура на поверхности скачет от раскаленной плазмы к абсолютному нулю. Важно другое — у планет не бывает лиц. А у Скита оно было. Огромное лицо из скальных плато, глаза и пыльных смерчей, пасть — расщелина на половину континента. И я видел, как это лицо улыбнулось мне. Оно видело меня и всех нас. Нам нельзя высаживаться. Помилуй нас Император!

languages.text: We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But this one did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!
languages.original_text: Нам нельзя высаживаться. Я знаю, что я видел — и нет, нам нельзя туда высаживаться. Дело не в том, что ветер способен содрать обшивку с десантного шлюпа за мгновение. И не в том, что температура на поверхности скачет от раскаленной плазмы к абсолютному нулю. Важно другое — у планет не бывает лиц. А у этой оно было. Огромное лицо из скальных плато, глаза из пыльных смерчей, пасть — расщелина на половину континента. И я видел, как это лицо улыбнулось мне. Оно видело меня и всех нас. Нам нельзя высаживаться. Помилуй нас Император!

traits.locale_text: We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But Skit did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But Skit did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But Skit did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But the Hermitage did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But this one did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

languages.text: No debemos bajar al planeta. Sé lo que he visto y no debemos posarnos en ese planeta. No es porque el viento vaya a arrancar el casco de la lanzadera de aterrizaje en un abrir y cerrar de ojos. Ni porque la temperatura de la superficie fluctúe entre la del plasma ardiente y el cero absoluto. No, es porque los planetas no tienen caras. Pero este sí. Una cara hecha de mesetas afiladas, con ojos hechos de ciclones ardientes y una boca formada por un cráter que ocupa medio continente. Y he visto que esa cara me sonreía. Nos ha visto. No debemos bajar al planeta. ¡Que el Emperador se apiade de nosotros!
languages.original_text: We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But this one did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

traits.locale_text: No debemos bajar al planeta. Sé lo que he visto y no debemos posarnos en ese planeta. No es porque el viento vaya a arrancar el casco de la lanzadera de aterrizaje en un abrir y cerrar de ojos. Ni porque la temperatura de la superficie fluctúe entre la del plasma ardiente y el cero absoluto. No, es porque los planetas no tienen caras. Pero este sí. Una cara hecha de mesetas afiladas, con ojos hechos de ciclones ardientes y una boca formada por un cráter que ocupa medio continente. Y he visto que esa cara me sonreía. Nos ha visto. No debemos bajar al planeta. ¡Que el Emperador se apiade de nosotros!

languages.text: 我们决不能降落在那颗行星上。我知道我看到了什么，所以不行，我们绝对不能降落在那颗行星上。这既不是因为行星风暴会转眼间把登陆艇撕成碎片，也不是行星表面的温度烫得像炽红的等离子体，或是冷得像绝对零度一样。不是，是因为别的行星都没有脸，但那颗行星却有。它有一张由参差不齐的高原组成的大脸，炽热的龙卷风组成的眼睛，以及由半片大陆那么宽的火山口组成的嘴。我看到那张脸在对我微笑。它看到了我，它看到了我们所有人。我们绝不能降落在那颗行星上，愿帝皇怜悯我们！
languages.original_text: We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But this one did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

traits.locale_text: 我们决不能降落在那颗行星上。我知道我看到了什么，所以不行，我们绝对不能降落在那颗行星上。这既不是因为行星风暴会转眼间把登陆艇撕成碎片，也不是行星表面的温度烫得像炽红的等离子体，或是冷得像绝对零度一样。不是，是因为别的行星都没有脸，但那颗行星却有。它有一张由参差不齐的高原组成的大脸，炽热的龙卷风组成的眼睛，以及由半片大陆那么宽的火山口组成的嘴。我看到那张脸在对我微笑。它看到了我，它看到了我们所有人。我们绝不能降落在那颗行星上，愿帝皇怜悯我们！

languages.text: 落下してはいけない。目撃したアレは知っている。ダメだーーあの惑星に降り立ってはいけない。風で着陸するシャトルの船体が瞬く間に引き裂かれる可能性があるからじゃない。ならば表面温度が赤くて熱いプラズマと絶対零度の間で変動するせいかって？違う、惑星には顔がない。でもこの惑星にはある。ワサワサした高原の大きな輪郭、燃えるような竜巻の目、大陸の半分を横切るクレーターの口。そして、その顔がこちらに微笑みかけている。こちらを見ている。私達みんなを見ている。落ちてはいけない。皇帝よ、どうかお慈悲を！
languages.original_text: We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But this one did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

traits.locale_text: 落下してはいけない。目撃したアレは知っている。ダメだーーあの惑星に降り立ってはいけない。風で着陸するシャトルの船体が瞬く間に引き裂かれる可能性があるからじゃない。ならば表面温度が赤くて熱いプラズマと絶対零度の間で変動するせいかって？違う、惑星には顔がない。でもこの惑星にはある。ワサワサした高原の大きな輪郭、燃えるような竜巻の目、大陸の半分を横切るクレーターの口。そして、その顔がこちらに微笑みかけている。こちらを見ている。私達みんなを見ている。落ちてはいけない。皇帝よ、どうかお慈悲を！

languages.text: Wir dürfen nicht auf dem Planeten landen. Ich weiß, was ich gesehen habe, und nein — wir dürfen nicht auf diesem Planeten landen. Nicht, weil der Wind die Hülle des Landeshuttles im Handumdrehen abreißen könnte. Oder weil die Temperatur auf der Oberfläche zwischen glühendem Plasma und absolutem Nullpunkt schwankt. Nein, es liegt daran, dass Planeten keine Gesichter haben. Aber dieser hier hat eins. Ein riesiges Gesicht mit zerklüfteten Plateaus, Augen aus feurigen Tornados und einem Mund, der aus einem Krater von der Größe eines halben Kontinents besteht. Und ich sah, wie dieses Gesicht mich anlächelte. Es sah mich. Es sah uns alle. Wir dürfen den Planeten nicht verlassen. Imperator, hab Erbarmen mit uns!
languages.original_text: We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But this one did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

languages.text: Nous ne devons pas mettre le pied sur cette planète. Je sais ce que j'ai vu, et non... nous ne devons pas nous poser là-bas. Pas parce que le vent peut réduire la carlingue de la navette en miettes en un clin d'œil. Ou parce que la température de surface oscille entre le plasma en fusion et le zéro absolu. Non, c'est parce que les planètes n'ont pas de visage. Alors que celle-ci en a un. Un visage fait de plateaux escarpés, avec des yeux de tornades ardentes, et une gueule formée par un cratère grand comme la moitié d'un continent. Et ce visage m'a souri. Il m'a vu. Il nous a tous vus. Nous ne devons pas mettre le pied sur cette planète. Que l'Empereur ait pitié de nous !
languages.original_text: We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But this one did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

traits.locale_text: Nous ne devons pas mettre le pied sur cette planète. Je sais ce que j'ai vu, et non... nous ne devons pas nous poser là-bas. Pas parce que le vent peut réduire la carlingue de la navette en miettes en un clin d'œil. Ou parce que la température de surface oscille entre le plasma en fusion et le zéro absolu. Non, c'est parce que les planètes n'ont pas de visage. Alors que celle-ci en a un. Un visage fait de plateaux escarpés, avec des yeux de tornades ardentes, et une gueule formée par un cratère grand comme la moitié d'un continent. Et ce visage m'a souri. Il m'a vu. Il nous a tous vus. Nous ne devons pas mettre le pied sur cette planète. Que l'Empereur ait pitié de nous !

languages.text: Gezegene iniş yapmamalıyız. Ne gördüğümü biliyorum, o gezegene katiyetle ayak basmamalıyız. Rüzgâr, iniş mekiğinin gövdesini bir anda paramparça edebileceği için değil. Yüzeydeki sıcaklık, kızgın plazma ile mutlak sıfır arasında gidip geldiği için de değil. Hayır, gezegenlerin suratı olmadığı için. Bunun var. Diş diş platoların oluşturduğu engin bir surat, azılı hortumlardan gözler ve yarım kıta ilerideki bir kraterden ağız. Gördüm, bu yüz bana gülümsedi. Beni gördü. Hepimizi gördü. Gezegene iniş yapmamalıyız. İmparator bize merhamet etsin!
languages.original_text: We must not make planetfall. I know what I saw, and no — we must not set down on that planet. It is not because the wind could tear the hull off the landing shuttle in the blink of an eye. Or because the temperature on the surface fluctuates between red-hot plasma and absolute zero. No, it's because planets do not have faces. But this one did. A vast face of jagged plateaus, eyes of fiery tornadoes, and a mouth made from a crater half a continent across. And I saw that face smiling at me. It saw me. It saw all of us. We must not make planetfall. Emperor have mercy on us!

traits.locale_text: Gezegene iniş yapmamalıyız. Ne gördüğümü biliyorum ve hayır, bu gezegene ayak basmamalıyız. Rüzgâr bulutu iniş mekiğinin gövdesini göz açıp kapayıncaya kadar paramparça edebileceği için değil. Yüzeydeki sıcaklık, kızgın plazma ile mutlak sıfır arasında gidip geldiği için de değil. Hayır, gezegenlerin yüzü olmadığı için. Bunun var. Sivri platoların oluşturduğu büyük bir yüz, azılı hortumlardan gözler ve yarım kıta ilerideki bir kraterden ağız. Gördüm, bu yüz bana gülümsedi. Beni gördü. Hepimizi gördü. Gezegene iniş yapmamalıyız. İmparator bize merhamet etsin!
